program: Master of Science in Data Science (MS)

sections.text: Columbia’s MS in Data Science trains students to build and apply data‑driven methods, combining computer science, statistics, and domain expertise.

items: Core in machine learning, probability/statistics, and algorithms
Electives in specialized domains and tools
sections.text: Students complete core technical courses, select electives, and undertake applied work with attention to responsible data use.

items: Minimum program credits per DSI policy
Undergraduate preparation in CS, math, and statistics recommended
Capstone or project completion as specified
sections.text: Admission and completion requirements follow the Data Science Institute’s policies and recommended preparation.
Graduates pursue careers in data science, machine learning engineering, analytics, and research across industries.
